name: Caroline Vreeland Tribute Site
description: A passion-driven digital tribute to fashion icon and singer Caroline Vreeland, designed, developed, and optimized by Rito as a high-performance, editorial-grade fan archive. Featured in The New York Times and ranked in Google's top results for her name.

mainEntity.name: Caroline Vreeland
mainEntity.description: Caroline Vreeland is a singer, model, and fashion personality known for her bold aesthetic and creative legacy as the great-granddaughter of Vogue editor Diana Vreeland.
